ComicInfo.Penciller: Alfredo Alcala,Ben Towle,Glenn Fabry,Joshua Boulet,Peter Bagge,Troy Nixey,Peter Bagge,Ben Towle,Alfredo Alcala,Troy Nixey
ComicInfo.Summary:
Grandpa spots an old suit of armor and things he might be dashing and romantic. However, he startles Grandma while she is dusting the torture museum. She clobbers him and he tosses the armor out.
Little Sophie drowns while her mother Diane is posting on Facebook, but comes back to life with eerie consequences.
A woman is born as old-aged and progresses back to infancy and frailty over 67 years.
Mother Creepy flashes back to getting into a romantic mood with Father Creepy
ComicInfo.Writer: Alex de Campi,Bill Pearson,Damon Gentry,Dan Braun,Glenn Fabry,Joshua Boulet,Peter Bagge,Alex de Campi,Bill Pearson,Dan Braun,Damon Gentry,Troy Nixey
ComicInfo.Title: A Knight in Shining Garbage; Drown Town; Ada; Reminiscing; Brooklyn 1950
